title: Grand Canyon National Park: Minutes Out In It
body: Minute Out In It       Grand Canyon National Park's Minute Out In It is a collection of short audio and video clips of nature in action. Also included here are short videos that relate to the human history and cultural resources of the park. Enjoy these sights and sounds of Grand Canyon and be sure to look and listen for them during your next visit to the park.             CA Condor takes a dip in a Grand Canyon creek   Loading the player...    Transcript Water a sustainer of scarce riparian habitat in a desert environment. Minute Out In It. Grand Canyon National Park. Close Transcript     Visit JWPlayer docs for keyboard shortcuts  Duration:59 seconds                Arizona Centennial Steam Train Departing Grand Canyon   Loading the player...    Transcript This video has no narration. Only the sounds from the steam locomotive. Close Transcript     Visit JWPlayer docs for keyboard shortcuts  Duration:1 minute, 14 seconds                Minute Out In It: Hermit Creek - Pools and Pour-offs   Loading the player...    Transcript This video was recorded on April 21, 2012 along Hermit Creek, in the vicinity of the Hermit Creek Campground.
